name: resize_image
description: Resize image to specified dimensions while maintaining aspect ratio if only one dimension is provided.

image_path.description: Path to the input image file

width.description: New width in pixels. If not provided, maintains aspect ratio based on height.

height.description: New height in pixels. If not provided, maintains aspect ratio based on width.

output_path.description: Path for the output image. If not provided, will create auto-named file.
